de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Class AbstractNumberVectorNorm

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractNumberVectorDistanceFunction
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractNumberVectorNorm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceFunction<NumberVector>, Norm<NumberVector>, NumberVectorDistanceFunction<NumberVector>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSpatialNorm

    public abstract class AbstractNumberVectorNorm
extends AbstractNumberVectorDistanceFunction
implements Norm<NumberVector>
    Abstract base class for double-valued number-vector-based distances based on norms.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
